ResearchProjectDef.label: wastepack atomizer (Small)
ResearchProjectDef.description: A small wastepack atomizer that's barely better than lighting a trash can on fire. Due to inefficiencies in it's design, this version consumes a lot of energy and isn't as efficient compared to alternatives. But it's better than nothing.

ResearchProjectDef.label: wastepack atomizer (Large)
ResearchProjectDef.description: A large version of the wastepack atomizer. While this huge machine consumes an equally huge amount of energy, it's far more efficient in disposing of waste in a green manner.
